title: Part 1：Light/dark theme switching
content: Add a button with the id “Dark Mode” at the end of the <ul> in each page navigation.Add body.dark and its related selectors at the end of style.css to override the dark styles of the navigation, footer, and buttons.Create theme.js: find the button using getElementById, bind the click event, use classList.add/remove to toggle the dark class on the <body> element, and update the button text.
